notes: 9 speech databases for training and testing multilingual speech recognition applications in the car environment. Contains parallel 4 channel in-car recordings and a GSM channel. Contains interesting phonetically rich material. All orthographically transcribed. Speaker information included for gender, age, accent. Including pronunciation lexicon.
title: SpeechDat-Car databases
